title: UFO Disclosure - Best of Coast to Coast AM - 1/11/21
itunes:title: UFO Disclosure - Best of Coast to Coast AM - 1/11/21
description:
George Noory and UFO researcher Stephen Bassett explore his efforts to get Congress to hold hearings on extra terrestrial contact on Earth, why the military is pushing for disclosure, and whether the public would believe the government after covering up UFOs for decades.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com
